amendment.description: An amendment numbered 106 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to prohibit funds for BioMADE, a bioindustrial manufacturer that produces lab-grown meat for military bases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
